com.konakart.bl.modules

Class BaseModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.bl.modules.BaseModule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseMailModule, BaseOrderTotalModule, BasePaymentModule, BaseShippingModule, USPSAddrVal

    public class BaseModule
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all modules.

      • updateStaticVariablesNow

        protected boolean updateStaticVariablesNow(long lastUpdatedMS)
        Checks whether we should update the static variables now given the last updated was as specified.
        Parameters:
        lastUpdatedMS - the last time the static variables were updated (using system time)
        Returns:
        true to go ahead and update the static variables now, otherwise false

      • getResourceBundle

        protected java.util.ResourceBundle getResourceBundle(java.lang.String mutex,
                                                     java.lang.String bundleName,
                                                     java.util.HashMap<java.util.Locale,java.util.ResourceBundle> resourceBundleMap,
                                                     java.util.Locale locale)
                                              throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        The resource bundle is fetched for the locale and stored in a static hash table. Next time around it is retrieved from the hash table.
        Parameters:
        mutex - the mutex
        bundleName - the bundleName
        resourceBundleMap - the resourceBundleMap
        locale - the locale
        Returns:
        The resource bundle referenced by the locale
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected exception from the KonaKart engine

      • getZoneCodeForZoneName

        protected java.lang.String getZoneCodeForZoneName(java.lang.String zoneNameStr)
        Try to find the zone code for the specified zone name.
        Parameters:
        zoneNameStr - the zone name to find
        Returns:
        the zone code for the specified zone name or the zone name string that was specified if it can't be found. If more than one zone with the specified name is found we loop through the matching zones found and return the first non-null zone code that is found.
